title: Holistic Health Ribbon Cutting
cleaned_text: The Knoxville Chamber of Commerce Ambassadors will celebrate the grand opening of Holistic Health with a ribbon cutting on Friday, December 3 at 2 p.m. Holistic Health, owned by KC Rawlings, uses alternative medicine to bring balance to the body and support natural healing. Holistic Health uses homeopathy, whole food supplements, and herbs to support the body in the natural healing process. The ribbon cutting will take place Friday, December 3 at 2 p.m. Holistic Health is hosting an open house from 11 a.m.-6 p.m. with specials, snacks, giveaways, and more. The open house and ribbon cutting are open to the public. Holistic Health is located at 813 N. Lincoln St., #15 in Knoxville.
